client_id.Description: API Consumer Key available under My Apps section in developer portal

client_secret.Description: API Consumer secret available under My Apps section in developer portal

endpoint.Description: The Equinix API base URL to point out desired environment. Defaults to https://api.equinix.com

request_timeout.Description: The duration of time, in seconds, that the Equinix Platform API Client should wait before canceling an API request

response_max_page_size.Description: The maximum number of records in a single response for REST queries that produce paginated responses

additional_info.Description: One or more additional information key-value objects

authorization_key.Description: Text field used to authorize connection on the provider side. Value depends on a provider service profile used for connection

device_interface_id.Description: Identifier of network interface on a given device, used for a connection. If not specified then first available interface will be selected

device_uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the Network Edge virtual device from which the connection would originate

name.Description: Connection name. An alpha-numeric 24 characters string which can include only hyphens and underscores

named_tag.Description: The type of peering to set up in case when connecting to Azure Express Route. One of Public, Private, Microsoft, Manual

notifications.Description: A list of email addresses used for sending connection update notifications

port_uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the buyer's port from which the connection would originate

profile_uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the service provider's service profile

provider_status.Description: Connection provisioning status on service provider's side

purchase_order_number.Description: Connection's purchase order number to reflect on the invoice

redundancy_type.Description: Connection redundancy type, applicable for HA connections. Either primary or secondary

redundant_uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the redundant connection, applicable for HA connections

secondary_connection.Description: Definition of secondary connection for redundant, HA connectivity

authorization_key.Description: Text field used to authorize connection on the provider side. Value depends on a provider service profile used for connection

device_interface_id.Description: Identifier of network interface on a given device, used for a connection. If not specified then first available interface will be selected

device_uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the Network Edge virtual device from which the connection would originate

name.Description: Connection name. An alpha-numeric 24 characters string which can include only hyphens and underscores

port_uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the buyer's port from which the connection would originate

profile_uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the service provider's service profile

provider_status.Description: Connection provisioning status on service provider's side

redundancy_type.Description: Connection redundancy type, applicable for HA connections. Either primary or secondary

redundant_uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the redundant connection, applicable for HA connections

seller_metro_code.Description: The metro code that denotes the connection’s remote side (z-side)

seller_region.Description: The region in which the seller port resides

speed.Description: Speed/Bandwidth to be allocated to the connection

speed_unit.Description: Unit of the speed/bandwidth to be allocated to the connection

status.Description: Connection provisioning status on Equinix Fabric side

vlan_ctag.Description: C-Tag/Inner-Tag of the connection, a numeric character ranging from 2 - 4094

vlan_stag.Description: S-Tag/Outer-Tag of the connection, a numeric character ranging from 2 - 4094

zside_port_uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the port on the remote side (z-side)

zside_vlan_ctag.Description: C-Tag/Inner-Tag of the connection on the remote side (z-side)

zside_vlan_stag.Description: S-Tag/Outer-Tag of the connection on the remote side (z-side)

seller_metro_code.Description: The metro code that denotes the connection’s remote side (z-side)

seller_region.Description: The region in which the seller port resides

speed.Description: Speed/Bandwidth to be allocated to the connection

speed_unit.Description: Unit of the speed/bandwidth to be allocated to the connection

status.Description: Connection provisioning status on Equinix Fabric side

vlan_ctag.Description: C-Tag/Inner-Tag of the connection, a numeric character ranging from 2 - 4094

vlan_stag.Description: S-Tag/Outer-Tag of the connection, a numeric character ranging from 2 - 4094

zside_port_uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the port on the remote side (z-side)

zside_vlan_ctag.Description: C-Tag/Inner-Tag of the connection on the remote side (z-side)

zside_vlan_stag.Description: S-Tag/Outer-Tag of the connection on the remote side (z-side)

access_key.Description: Access Key used to accept connection on provider side

aws_connection_id.Description: Identifier of a hosted Direct Connect connection on AWS side, applicable for accepter resource with connections to AWS only

aws_profile.Description: AWS Profile Name for retrieving credentials from shared credentials file

connection_id.Description: Identifier of layer 2 connection that will be accepted

secret_key.Description: Secret Key used to accept connection on provider side

api_integration.Description: Specifies the API integration ID that was provided to the customer during onboarding

authkey_label.Description: Name of the authentication key label to be used by the Authentication Key service

bandwidth_alert_threshold.Description: Specifies the port bandwidth threshold percentage. If the bandwidth limit is met or exceeded, an alert is sent to the seller

bandwidth_threshold_notifications.Description: A list of email addresses that will receive notifications about bandwidth thresholds

connection_name_label.Description: Custom name used for calling a connections i.e. circuit. Defaults to Connection

ctag_label.Description: C-Tag/Inner-Tag label name for the connections

equinix_managed_port_vlan.Description: Boolean value that indicates whether the port and VLAN details are managed by Equinix

allow_remote_connections.Description: Indicates whether or not connections to this profile can be created from remote metro locations

test_profile.Description: Indicates whether or not this profile can be used for test connections

integration_id.Description: Specifies the API integration ID that was provided to the customer during onboarding

name.Description: Name of the service profile. An alpha-numeric 50 characters string which can include only hyphens and underscores

oversubscription.Description: Oversubscription limit that will cause alerting. Default is 1x

oversubscription_allowed.Description: Boolean value that determines if, regardless of the utilization, Equinix Fabric will continue to add connections to your links until we reach the oversubscription limit

port.Description: One or more definitions of ports associated with the profile

private.Description: Boolean value that indicates whether or not this is a private profile.

private_user_emails.Description: A list of email addresses associated to users that will be allowed to access this service profile. Applicable for private profiles

profile_statuschange_notifications.Description: A list of email addresses that will receive notifications about profile status changes

redundancy_required.Description: Boolean value that determines if yourconnections will require redundancy

secondary_vlan_from_primary.Description: Indicates whether the VLAN ID of the secondary connection is the same as the primary connection

servicekey_autogenerated.Description: Boolean value that indicates whether multiple connections can be created with the same authorization key

speed_band.Description: One or more definitions of supported speed/bandwidth configurations

speed.Description: Speed/bandwidth supported by given service profile

speed_unit.Description: Unit of the speed/bandwidth supported by given service profile

speed_customization_allowed.Description: Boolean value that determines if customer is allowed to enter a custom connection speed

speed_from_api.Description: Boolean valuta that determines if connection speed will be derived from an API call

tag_type.Description: Specifies additional tagging information required by the seller profile for Dot1Q to QinQ translation

uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the service profile

vc_statuschange_notifications.Description: A list of email addresses that will receive notifications about connections approvals and rejections

device_acl_status.Description: Status of ACL template provisioning process on a device, where template was applied

device_id.Description: Identifier of a network device where template was applied

inbound_rule.Description: One or more rules to specify allowed inbound traffic. Rules are ordered, matching traffic rule stops processing subsequent ones.

dst_port.Description: Inbound traffic destination ports. Either up to 10, comma separated ports or port range or any word

source_type.Description: Type of traffic source used in a given innbound rule

src_port.Description: Inbound traffic source ports. Either up to 10, comma separated ports or port range or any word

subnets.Description: Inbound traffic source IP subnets in CIDR format

uuid.Description: Unique identifier of ACL template resource

authentication_key.Description: Shared key used for BGP peer authentication

connection_id.Description: Identifier of a connection established between network device and remote service provider that will be used for peering

device_id.Description: Unique identifier of a network device that is a local peer in a given BGP peering configuration

local_ip_address.Description: IP address in CIDR format of a local device

acl_template_id.Description: Unique identifier of applied ACL template

additional_bandwidth.Description: Additional Internet bandwidth, in Mbps, that will be allocated to the device

byol.Description: Boolean value that determines device licensing mode: bring your own license or subscription (default)

core_count.Description: Number of CPU cores used by device

ibx.Description: Device location Equinix Business Exchange name

assigned_type.Description: Interface management type (Equinix Managed or empty)

interface_count.Description: Number of network interfaces on a device. If not specified, default number for a given device type will be used

license_file.Description: Path to the license file that will be uploaded and applied on a device, applicable for some device types in BYOL licensing mode

license_file_id.Description: Unique identifier of applied license file

license_token.Description: License Token applicable for some device types in BYOL licensing mode

notifications.Description: List of email addresses that will receive device status notifications

order_reference.Description: Name/number used to identify device order on the invoice

purchase_order_number.Description: Purchase order number associated with a device order

redundancy_type.Description: Device redundancy type applicable for HA devices, either primary or secondary

redundant_id.Description: Unique identifier for a redundant device, applicable for HA device

secondary_device.Description: Definition of secondary device applicable for HA setup

acl_template_id.Description: Unique identifier of applied ACL template

additional_bandwidth.Description: Additional Internet bandwidth, in Mbps, that will be allocated to the device

ibx.Description: Device location Equinix Business Exchange name

assigned_type.Description: Interface management type (Equinix Managed or empty)

license_file.Description: Path to the license file that will be uploaded and applied on a device, applicable for some device types in BYOL licensing mode

license_file_id.Description: Unique identifier of applied license file

license_token.Description: License Token applicable for some device types in BYOL licensing mode

notifications.Description: List of email addresses that will receive device status notifications

redundancy_type.Description: Device redundancy type applicable for HA devices, either primary or secondary

redundant_id.Description: Unique identifier for a redundant device, applicable for HA device

ssh_ip_address.Description: IP address of SSH enabled interface on the device

ssh_ip_fqdn.Description: FQDN of SSH enabled interface on the device

ssh_key.Description: Definition of SSH key that will be provisioned on a device

key_name.Description: Reference by name to previously provisioned public SSH key

vendor_configuration.Description: Map of vendor specific configuration parameters for a device

self_managed.Description: Boolean value that determines device management mode: self-managed or subscription (default)

ssh_ip_address.Description: IP address of SSH enabled interface on the device

ssh_ip_fqdn.Description: FQDN of SSH enabled interface on the device

ssh_key.Description: Definition of SSH key that will be provisioned on a device

key_name.Description: Reference by name to previously provisioned public SSH key

throughput_unit.Description: Device license throughput unit (Mbps or Gbps)

vendor_configuration.Description: Map of vendor specific configuration parameters for a device

name.Description: The name of SSH key used for identification

public_key.Description: The SSH public key. If this is a file, it can be read using the file interpolation function

uuid.Description: The unique identifier of the key

device_ids.Description: list of device identifiers to which user will have access

additional_info.Description: One or more specifications of additional buyer information attributes that can be provided in connection definition that uses given seller profile

captured_in_email.Description: Specified if additional information attribute can be captured in email

data_type.Description: Data type of additional information attribute. Either BOOLEAN, INTEGER or STRING

description.Description: Textual description of additional information attribute

mandatory.Description: Specifies if additional information attribute is mandatory to create connection

encapsulation.Description: Seller profile's encapsulation (either Dot1q or QinQ)

metro.Description: One or more specifications of metro locations supported by seller profile

ibxes.Description: List of IBXes supported within given metro

regions.Description: List of regions supported within given metro

redundancy_required.Description: Boolean that indicate if seller requires connections to be redundant

speed_band.Description: One or more specifications of speed/bandwidth supported by given seller profile

speed.Description: Speed/bandwidth supported by given service profile

speed_unit.Description: Unit of the speed/bandwidth supported by given service profile

speed_customization_allowed.Description: Boolean that indicates if seller allows customer to enter a custom connection speed

speed_from_api.Description: Boolean that indicates if seller is deriving connection speed from an API call

uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the seller profile

metro_codes.Description: List of metro codes of locations that should be served by resulting profiles

name_regex.Description: A regex string to apply on returned seller profile names and filter search results

profiles.Description: Resulting list of profiles that match filtering criteria

additional_info.Description: One or more specifications of additional buyer information attributes that can be provided in connection definition that uses given seller profile

captured_in_email.Description: Specified if additional information attribute can be captured in email

data_type.Description: Data type of additional information attribute. Either BOOLEAN, INTEGER or STRING

description.Description: Textual description of additional information attribute

mandatory.Description: Specifies if additional information attribute is mandatory to create connection

encapsulation.Description: Seller profile's encapsulation (either Dot1q or QinQ)

metro.Description: One or more specifications of metro locations supported by seller profile

ibxes.Description: List of IBXes supported within given metro

regions.Description: List of regions supported within given metro

redundancy_required.Description: Boolean that indicate if seller requires connections to be redundant

speed_band.Description: One or more specifications of speed/bandwidth supported by given seller profile

speed.Description: Speed/bandwidth supported by given service profile

speed_unit.Description: Unit of the speed/bandwidth supported by given service profile

speed_customization_allowed.Description: Boolean that indicates if seller allows customer to enter a custom connection speed

speed_from_api.Description: Boolean that indicates if seller is deriving connection speed from an API call

uuid.Description: Unique identifier of the seller profile

speed_bands.Description: List of speed bands that should be supported by resulting profiles

buyout.Description: Boolean value that indicates whether the port supports unlimited connections.

encapsulation.Description: The VLAN encapsulation of the port (Dot1q or QinQ)

priority.Description: The priority of the device (primary / secondary) where the port resides

status.Description: Port status that indicates whether a port has been assigned or is ready for connection
Account status for filtering. Possible values are Active, Processing, Submitted, Staged

core_count.Description: Number of CPU cores used to limit platform search results

flavor.Description: Device platform flavor that determines number of CPU cores and memory. Supported values: small, medium, large, xlarge

license_options.Description: List of device licensing options to limit platform search result. Supported values: BYOL (Bring Your Own License), Sub (license subscription)

management_types.Description: List of device management types to limit platform search results. Supported values: EQUINIX-CONFIGURED, SELF-CONFIGURED

memory.Description: The amount of memory provided by device platform

memory_unit.Description: Unit of memory provider by device platform

packages.Description: List of software package codes to limit platform search results

most_recent.Description: Boolean value to indicate that most recent version should be used, in case when more than one result is returned

packages.Description: Limits returned versions to those that are supported by given software package codes

stable.Description: Boolean value to limit query results to stable versions only

version_regex.Description: A regex string to apply on returned versions and filter search results

category.Description: Device type category, one of: Router, Firewall, SDWAN

code.Description: Device type short code, unique identifier of a network device type

metro_codes.Description: List of metro codes where device type has to be available

vendor.Description: Device type vendor i.e. Cisco, Juniper Networks, VERSA Networks
